mapper.select:
select
from T_CUST_CUSTLINKMAN where FCUSTID = #{fcustid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and FSTATUS in('0','2')

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from t_cust_custbasedata join T_CUST_CUSTLINKMAN on T_CUST_CUSTLINKMAN.fcustid = t_cust_custbasedata.fid join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid where T_CUST_CUSTLINKMAN.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
